arts.ttl: Chelsea v Wolves preview: Interim boss rebuilding confidence for London trip
arts.sum: Taking over a team that has two points from 10 Premier League games and is rock bottom of the table, Collins was keen to stay positive and outline Wolves' strengths ahead of a tough trip to the capital. Interim Wolves boss James Collins is working to rebuild the players' confidence and has called on them to start the club's revival at Chelsea tonight.

arts.sum: Wolves travel to Stamford Bridge today in a state of crisis. The club is currently rock bottom of the Premier League, still winless after ten games.
